web/src/components/machines/MachineCard..description: Added aria-labels to header buttons: failover selector uses dynamic label with strategyInfo.label, backup badge uses conditional label based on hasCpuStandby, more options button has static aria-label. Badge component supports aria-label prop.

web/src/components/tailadmin-ui/index.js.description: DropdownMenu component (lines 577-664) is custom implementation lacking ARIA attributes. Used for main options menu and VS Code IDE dropdown. Needs aria-expanded, aria-haspopup, role='menu', role='menuitem', and keyboard navigation.
